segments.text: Lisa , would you like to go to the library with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Do you think we can go buy a newspaper first ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . First we'll go buy a newspaper and then we'll go to the library .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are we going to walk or drive ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The weather is really nice today . Let's walk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The weather is good now , but I think it's suppose to rain this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright , then let's take an umbrella . Is your brother coming with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , it's already 10:00 AM . He must have been up late last night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , he didn't come home until 12:00 AM .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope he can come later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope so too . I'll give him a call when we get there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do we get to the library from here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's straight down this road on the left , next to the museum . It takes about 10 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
